targets.query: SELECT last("sensorDataPoints_humidity_percentage") FROM "tado" WHERE ("room" = 'Badezimmer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("sensorDataPoints_humidity_percentage") FROM "tado" WHERE ("room" = 'Büro') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("sensorDataPoints_humidity_percentage") FROM "tado" WHERE ("room" = 'Gäste WC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
